article_title: Why Health Insurance Prices Will Continue To Rise in 2016 and Beyond

article_metadata.description: Challenging market conditions on the ACA exchanges have made it difficult for health insurance companies to turn a profit. Unfortunately for consumers, this is sure to have negative effects on both pricing and availability of plans. In this article, we explore how we got to this situation and go over possible cost-mitigating solutions for 2016.
article_metadata.author: Robert Harrow
